thread.section_title: RC Willey Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of RC Willey | rcwilley.com | 10 of 150
thread.title: Christopher

author: Christopher
title: Christopher
text: I was satisfied with my delivery. The only thing I was confused on was paying the $11.00 recycle fee for my old mattress. The guy shows up and I asked if they were taking my old one and he asked me if it was clean??? It's a used mattress it was 8 years old and had some juice spilled on it. That should be specified at the beginning because I would have been very frustrated if they would have made me keep it.
